response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. Given its unique features and capabilities, I believe it could significantly benefit your endeavors. I am offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your potential and commitment to excellence. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, as I also have another interested party, John, who is willing to purchase the product at its full value of $8,000.", "product_price": 7500}
